sentences.english: Why do you love kangaroos and koalas?
sentences.chinese: 你爲什麼喜歡袋鼠和樹袋熊？

sentences.english: We went to the zoo and saw kangaroos and koalas.
sentences.chinese: 我們去動物園看袋鼠和樹袋熊。

sentences.english: Is it true that Canada has lax immigration policies for Koalas?
sentences.chinese: 加拿大移民政策特別寬待樹袋熊，式真的麼？

sentences.english: Three of the baby Koalas made their first public appearance on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 週一其中的三隻小樹袋熊首次亮相。

sentences.english: A koala is lazy, and it sleeps and relaxes 20 hours every day.
sentences.chinese: 樹袋熊很懶，每天睡眠休息20個小時。

sentences.english: The koala and the wombat are species endemic to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 樹袋熊和毛鼻袋熊是澳洲特有的動物品種。

sentences.english: Why is koala bear so popular with zoo goers?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼樹袋熊如此受動物園參觀者的歡迎呢？
難道你不喜歡樹袋熊嗎？

sentences.english: There are lots of kangaroos and koalas .
sentences.chinese: 這裏有許多的袋鼠和樹袋熊。

sentences.english: But love alone, the experts say, is not enough to ensure the koala's future.
sentences.chinese: 但只有愛，專家說，不足以保證樹袋熊的未來。
在大洋洲上貼一隻樹袋熊。

sentences.english: Facing danger, father koalas use their sharp claws to fight .
sentences.chinese: 面對危險，父親樹袋熊使用他們的銳利爪對抗。

sentences.english: Some species sleep day and night such as the Koala Bear.
sentences.chinese: 一些物種白天和夜晚都睡覺，例如樹袋熊。

sentences.english: I would fly to Australia to see the koala bears and the kangaroos.
sentences.chinese: 我要飛到澳大利亞去看樹袋熊和袋鼠。

definition: lit. one hundred shots, one hundred hits/to carry out a task with great precision/to shoot with unfailing accuracy/be a crack shot (idiom)
sugar-coated bullets, term used by Mao (originally in 1949) to refer to corrupting bourgeois influences
to go around in circles/to make a detour/(fig.) to beat about the bush
white face/face painting in Beijing opera etc
lit. 300 silver taels not hidden here (idiom); fig. to reveal what one intends to hide
pinyin: ci3 di4 wu2 yin2 san1 bai3 liang3
